TopicTitle: Game freezes reight after loading screen.

Articles.Content: So as soon as the game is done from the loading screen is freezes and keeps playing music, the music ends later though. I get to press the close button on one of the menu's that pop up on startup. The orange menu buttons are still grey like they haven't finished their animation yet. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Have you tried reinstalling the game?

On 4/12/2021 at 12:04 PM, SubSmartGaming said:

So as soon as the game is done from the loading screen is freezes and keeps playing music, the music ends later though. I get to press the close button on one of the menu's that pop up on startup. The orange menu buttons are still grey like they haven't finished their animation yet. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

We need a log file to help.

Are you using any mods?

There are 3 possible reasons

1. Corrupt game
2. Mod installed wrong/incompatible mod
3.  Low specs

the log file (KSP.log) will be helpful.

Ah, sorry for taking so long to reply but here is my KSP.log file. I don't think I have any mods but if I see any ill turn them off.  Here are my specs 

OS: Windows 10  (10.0.0) 64bit
CPU: AMD A9-9430 RADEON R5, 5 COMPUTE CORES 2C+3G  (2)
RAM: 7117 MB
GPU: AMD Radeon(TM) R5 Graphics (1016MB)

[snip]

Edited April 28, 2021 by Vanamonde
I fixed it, uninstalled addons, turned of AMD compatibility in launcher and turned all the graphics down.

Thank you for putting that log file in spoiler tags, @SubSmartGaming, but I regret that we've had to remove it anyway. The problem is that posts that big can cause page loading errors. Please upload the file to a sharing service and use the link they provide in your post instead.

https://filebin.net/rhsfgv4kghnp4tak This has the Log file in it.

 

Edited April 28, 2021 by SubSmartGaming
needed to state reason for link

14 hours ago, SubSmartGaming said:

https://filebin.net/rhsfgv4kghnp4tak This has the Log file in it.

 

there's no anomaly in the .log file, but i think it's your specs. Maybe your PC can't handle it, I don't know
You don't have some mods either.
Huh, weird. But as I stated before I did fix it, it might've been my specs.
